title: It’s On (Ep 1384)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the Democrat’s devious Election Day plans for chaos in the event of a Trump win. I also address the positive numbers going into Election Day.

News Picks:


We MUST get out the vote. Let’s swamp them on Election Day turnout.

Voter turnout is going to blow away records.



Twitter censors Trump on election eve. 

The Democrats are already preparing for post-election chaos if they lose.

The Obama economic recovery was the worst in American history.

The unbroken leg fallacy explained.
